album-cover-size-tooltip: Album cover size in pixels; set 0 to hide
allow-small-split-tooltip: Enable adding additional master windows in a horizontal split style.
allow-tearing-tooltip: Master switch for allowing tearing to occur.
always-center-master-tooltip: When using orientation=center, keep the master window centered, even when it is the only window in the workspace.
api-key-tooltip: If an API key is provided, searches will be preformed with that user's browsing settings and default filters from wallhaven.cc. W/o API key you'll always see SFW content.
app-drawer-columns-tooltip: Number of columns to show icons in
apply-tooltip: Apply changes, export includes, reload sway.
auto-show-hide-tooltip: Auto-hide dock, show on hotspot pointed.
autotiling-tooltip: Automates changing the horizontal/vertical window split orientation.
autotiling-depth-limit-tooltip: Depth limit determines how deep will autotiling work. The '2' value allows to mimic the master/stack layout on horizontal displays. On vertical displays you may like the '3' value. Use '0' for no limit. Beyond the limit, tabbed and stacking layouts will work back again. The '1' value is not recommended, as it will spoil autotiling.
autotiling-split-tooltip: Split width/height specifies the horizontal/vertical value multiplier to resize descendant containers to after splitting.
backup-desc: Back up configs and data files to a .tar.gz file
backup-invalid-file: is not a valid backup file.
backup-restore-desc: Restore configs and data files from a .tar.gz file
backup-restore-success:
Configs and data restored from backup.
Press the 'Apply' button to changes to take effect.
backup-restore-warning: Be careful, this action cannot be undone!
before-sleep-tooltip: Command to execute before systemd puts the computer to sleep.
calculate-lat-long-tooltip:
If you were online during the first run, the Lat/Long 
values should already reflect your timezone settings.
 Push the button if something went wrong
AND if you're online now.
capslock-tooltip: Initially enables or disables CapsLock on startup.
clickfinger-behavior-tooltip:
Button presses with 1, 2, or 3 fingers will be mapped to LMB, RMB, and MMB respectively.
This disables interpretation of clicks based on location on the touchpad.
click-method-tooltip:
button_areas (default) - left/middle/right button click when pressing down the touchpad in specific areas (bottom left, middle and right by default)
clickfinger - left/middle/right button click when pressing down the touchpad with 1, 2 or 3 fingers
clipboard-history-tooltip: Determines whether to store clipboard history to cliphist (add commands to autostart).
close-tooltip: Close the window w/o applying changes.
color-border-start-tooltip: Color of the frame (rgba) or the starting color of the gradient.
color-border-end-tooltip: Final gradient color (rgba). Leave blank for no gradient
custom-field-name-tooltip:
User defined field that you need, but it's missing from the the form above.
Enter field name here. Think twice before you use it.
custom-field-value-tooltip:
User defined field that you need, but it's missing
from the the form above.
Enter field value here. Think twice before you use it.
default-split-ratio-tooltip: The default split ratio on window open. 1 means even 50/50 split. 0.1 - 1.9.
device-tooltip:
Determines whether to use a certain device identifier
or just an input type.
disable-input-inhibitor-tooltip: Allows input events (like keyboard, mouse) on the lock screen.
dock-css-name-tooltip: Dock css style sheet file name
drag-lock-tooltip: When enabled, lifting the finger off for a short time while dragging will not drop the dragged item.
drawer-css-name-tooltip: Application drawer css style sheet file name
enable-mpris-widget-tooltip: Show MPRIS media player control widget
exclusive-zone-tooltip: Determines whether to move other windows away.
exit-menu-css-name-tooltip: Exit menu css style sheet file name
extend-border-grab-area-tooltip: Extends the area around the border where you can click and drag on, only used when Resize_on_border is on.
file-search-columns-tooltip: Number of columns to show file search result in
float-switch-override-focus-tooltip:
If enabled (1 or 2), focus will change to the window under the cursor
when changing from tiled-to-floating and vice versa.
If 2, focus will also follow mouse on float-to-float switches.
focus-follow-mouse-tooltip:
Specifies if and how cursor movement should affect window focus.
0 - Cursor movement will not change focus.
1 - Cursor movement will always change focus to the window under the cursor.
2 - Cursor focus will be detached from keyboard focus.
3 - Cursor focus will be completely separate from keyboard focus.
focus-on-activate-tooltip: Whether Hyprland should focus an app that requests to be focused (an `activate` request)
force-split-tooltip: 0 -> split follows mouse, 1 -> always split to the left (new = left or top) 2 -> always split to the right (new = right or bottom)
full-width-height-tooltip: Determines if to take full screen width/height.
hide-cursor-on-touch-tooltip: Hides the cursor when the last input was a touch input until a mouse input is done.
hotspot-delay-tooltip:
Hotspot delay in milliseconds: the smaller, the faster the mouse
pointer needs to enter the hotspot for the dock to appear.
Set 0 to disable this feature (default 20).
hover-icon-on-border-tooltip: Show a cursor icon when hovering over borders, only used when resize_on_border is on.
hyprland-include-tooltip: Determines if to export these settings to the 'includes.conf' file.
inherit-fullscreen-tooltip: Inherit fullscreen status when cycling/swapping to another window (e.g. monocle layout).
interface-locale-tooltip:
Select a value to force one
or leave `auto` for auto-detection.
keep-resident-tooltip: Keep the program resident in memory.
key-press-enables-dpms-tooltip: If DPMS is set to off, wake up the monitors if a key is pressed.
keyboard-include-tooltip: Determines if to export the 'keyboard' config include.
keyboard-layout-tooltip:
Layout of the keyboard like 'us' or 'de'.
Multiple layouts can be specified
by separating them with commas.
keyboard-repeat-delay-tooltip: Amount of time a key must be held before it starts repeating.
keyboard-repeat-rate-tooltip: Frequency of key repeats once the repeat delay passed.
keyboard-tooltip:
Determines if the help window
should intercept the keyboard input.
keyboard-variant-tooltip: Variant of the keyboard like 'dvorak' or 'colemak'
launcher-at-start-tooltip: Show launcher button at the beginning of the dock
leave-blank-to-use-above: Leave blank to use the above.
layers-hog-keyboard-focus-tooltip: If true, will make keyboard-interactive layers keep their focus on mouse move (e.g. panel, launchers)
leave-blank-btn-tooltip: Leave blank to disable powerbar button
left-handed-tooltip: Enables or disables left handed mode.
lock-screen-include-tooltip: Determines if to add these settings to the 'autostart' include.
locker-tooltip: Program used to lock the screen.
locker-tooltip2: You may choose from `gtklock` and `swaylock`, if both installed.
logout-tooltip:
Command to logout the current user.
Leave blank to disable this feature.
margin-tooltip: Margin from the edge in pixels
master-orientation-tooltip: Default placement of the master area, can be left, right, top, bottom or center.
master-split-factor-tooltip: (0.0 - 1.0) master split factor, the ratio of master split.
middle-emulation-tooltip: Enables or disables middle click emulation
mouse-move-enables-dpms-tooltip: If DPMS is set to off, wake up the monitors if the mouse moves.
mouse-move-focuses-monitor-tooltip: Whether mouse moving into a different monitor should focus it.
mouse-refocus-tooltip:
If disabled and follow_mouse=1 then mouse focus will not
switch to the hovered window unless the mouse crosses a window boundary
mouse-sensitivity-tooltip: Sets the mouse input sensitivity (libinput#pointer-acceleration) in range -1.0 to 1.0.
name: name
new-is-master-tooltip: Whether a newly open window should replace the master or join the slaves.
new-on-top-tooltip: Whether a newly open window should be on the top of the stack.
nm-applet-tooltip: Determines if to autostart NetworkManager applet. Requires compositor restart.
no-cursor-warps-tooltip: If set, will not warp the cursor in many cases (focusing, keybinds, etc)
no-focus-fallback-tooltip: if true, will not fall back to the next available window when moving focus in a direction where no window was found.
no-gaps-when-only-tooltip: Whether to apply gaps when there is only one window on a workspace, aka. smart gaps.
numlock-tooltip: Initially enables or disables NumLock on startup.
on-layer-tooltip: Determines the gtk-layer-shell layer to show the content on.
open-on-overlay-tooltip: Open on overlay layer (over panels etc.)
open-on-super-tooltip: Binds the SUPER key release to the program execution
overlay-tooltip:
Determines if to display the help window
on the overlay layer, or as a regular window.
own-command-tooltip:
You may enter your own command here,
to replace the settings above.
panel-css-name-tooltip: Panel css style sheet file name
permanent-tooltip: Keeps the dock resident, but w/o the hotspot.
permanent-direction-override-tooltip: Makes the preselect direction persist until either this mode is turned off, another direction is specified, or a non-direction is specified (anything other than l,r,u/t,d/b).
playerctl-tooltip: For this module to work, you need the `gtklock-powerbar-module` package.
pointer-device-include-tooltip: Determines if to export the 'pointer' config include.
power-off-tooltip:
Command to power off the computer.
Leave blank to disable this feature.
powerbar-tooltip: For this module to work, you need the `gtklock-powerbar-module` package.
preserve-split-tooltip: If enabled, the split (side/top) will not change regardless of what happens to the container.
pseudotiling-tooltip:
Master switch for pseudotiling. Enabling is bound to mainMod + P in the keybinds section.
Pseudotiled windows retain their floating size when tiled.
reboot-tooltip:
Command to reboot the computer.
Leave blank to disable this feature.
resize-on-border-tooltip: Enables resizing windows by clicking and dragging on borders and gaps
restore-defaults-tooltip: Press to restore default idle settings.
run-through-compositor-tooltip: Run programs through 'swaymsg exec' on sway or 'hyprctl dispatch exec' on Hyprland.
run-with-gtk-theme-tooltip: Run apps with GTK_THEME=<default-gtk-theme> environment variable. Necessary to set a theme other than Adwaita for libadwaita/GTK4 apps.
screenshot-applet-tooltip: Determines if to show the screenshot applet in the system tray
scroll-button-tooltip:
Sets the scroll button. Has to be an int, cannot be a string.
Check `wev` if you have any doubts regarding the ID. 0 means default.
scroll-factor-tooltip: Scroll speed will be scaled by the given value.
show-category-buttons-tooltip: Show freedesktop category buttons on top.
show-on-startup-tooltip: Uncheck to avoid running this window on startup
show-power-bar-tooltip: Show power bar below the application grid
sleep-timeout-tooltip:
Sleep timeout in seconds.
Must be longer than Lock screen timeout.
smart-split-tooltip: Allows a more precise control over the window split direction based on the cursor’s position. The window is conceptually divided into four triangles, and cursor’s triangle determines the split direction. Turns on preserve_split.
smart-resizing-tooltip: If enabled, resizing direction will be determined by the mouse’s position on the window (nearest to which corner). Else, it is based on the window’s tiling position.
special-scale-factor-tooltip: 0 - 1 -> specifies the scale factor of windows on the special workspace
startup-delay-tooltip: When a vertical dock coexists with a horizontal panel (or vice versa), the dock should be started when the panel is fully launched, to avoid conflicting positions. Set the delay in seconds.
suspend-tooltip:
Command to suspend the computer (put to sleep).
Leave blank to disable this feature.
switch-user-tooltip:
Command to switch the current user.
Leave blank to disable this feature.
tags-tooltip: Tags separated by comma. Images tagged with all given tags will be searched.
tap-and-drag-tooltip: Sets the tap and drag mode for the touchpad.
tap-button-map-tooltip:
'lrm' treats 1 finger as left click, 2 fingers as right click, and 3 fingers as middle click.
'lmr' treats 1 finger as left click, 2 fingers as middle click, and 3 fingers as right click.
tap-to-click-tooltip: Tapping on the touchpad with 1, 2, or 3 fingers will send LMB, RMB, and MMB respectively.
touchpad-device-include-tooltip: Determines if to export the 'touchpad' config include.
update-command-tooltip: You may override the default system update command here
update-indicator-interval-tooltip: Specifies how often (in minutes) to check for updates
update-tray-icon-tooltip: Determines if to show system updates tray icon
use-active-for-splits-tooltip: Whether to prefer the active window or the mouse position for splits.
use-icon-theme: Use icon theme in power bar
use-icon-theme-tooltip: Use icon theme icons instead of built in
userinfo-tooltip:
For this module to work, you need to set the user info first. 
You may use the `mugshot` or `SwaySettings` package. 
You also need the `gtklock-userinfo-module` package.
vrr-tooltip: Controls the VRR (Adaptive Sync) of your monitors. 0 - off, 1 - on, 2 - fullscreen only
web-browser-combo-tooltip:
Select from predefined commands
known for installed browsers.
web-browser-tooltip:
Command to run web browser
(probably w/ Wayland-specific arguments)
workspaces-tooltip: Defines which workspaces to use autotiling on: `autotiling -w`.
xkb-kb-rules-tooltip: Rules to be used for keyboard mapping composition
